column1: Kata Robata////Uni and King Crab Spoons - an amazing combination...creamy uni
column4: all covered in a refreshing soy-vinegar sauce. It had the makings of the 'perfect bite'...if only the uni had been fresher. However
column5: since there wasn't that much uni on the spoon
column6: the fishiness was very subtle and the whole thing was still delectable. I only notice because I'm an avid uni enthusiast.
